titleStmt.title: Miscellanea, or, A choice collection of wise and ingenious sayings, &c of princes, philosophers, statesmen, courtiers, and others out of several antient and modern authors, for the pleasurable entertainment of the nobility and gentry of both sexes / by G.M.
titleStmt.author: Miege, Guy, 1644-1718?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Miege by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
